level.text: On or before the 1st day of February of each year, the Secretary shall compile and submit to the Council of the District of Columbia, on behalf of the Mayor, a report covering the disclosure activities of each agency and of the Executive as a whole during the preceding fiscal year.

level.heading: SOURCE Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 6211, 6219 (January 27, 1978); as amended by:
